title.narrative: Agricultural Development: Southern Sudan Livelihoods Development Project

description.narrative: The overall goal of the project is to reduce poverty and hunger in the project area. The objective is to increase food security and incomes from farm and off-farm activities. This will be achieved by (i) supporting community-based development of productive activities with the full participation of vulnerable community members, including women; and (ii) promoting infrastructure that supports improved food security and higher incomes derived from agricultural activities.

name.narrative: Agricultural Development: Southern Sudan Livelihoods Development Project

description.narrative: This point represents the centroid of the project area. For more detailed geographic information, please refer to the project page on the IFAD website.
